description:
Grandpa was raising http://anidb.net/ch91276 [Chito] and http://anidb.net/ch91277 [Yuuri] until a battle occured in their place of living. He then gave them http://anidb.net/ch98375 [Kettenkrad] to escape to safety. After that his state and whereabouts are unknown. During his earlier years he travelled to multiple places and gathered books.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Ojiisan
